effect.short: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Only Pokémon that share a type with the user will take damage from this move.

flavorTexts.text:
Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage
on any Pokémon of the same type in the area
around it.
